title.narrative: GEMS 3 Growth and Employment in States Programme - Technical Advice to Government Agencies on improving business environment

description.narrative: This activity (GEMS 3 Growth and Employment in States Programme - Technical Advice to Government Agencies on improving business environment) is a component of Growth and Employment in States Programme (GEMS)- reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £46,479,095. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Domestic revenue mobilisation, Business Policy and Administration. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, IMC Worldwide. The start date is 10-09-2008 and the end date is 30-12-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Executive - General Public Service - Executive - executive
